This piece is a classically designed 9 carat white gold diamond ring. The centre solitaire is a brilliant cut stone and is 0.07ct in size, held in place within an illusion setting. Twin bezel-set 0.015ct stones are placed either side of the mount.

 - 9ct White Gold
 - Brilliant Cut Diamond Solitaire
 - Total Diamond Weight: 0.10ct
 - Illusion Set
